comments.body:
Hi all, I want to present you a small application made by me.
It simply checks main events status and warns the user with sound (a sexy voice ;-D) when one of them starts. It’s not much but I find it very functional as it optimizes my in game time and allows me to forget about event timers on the web. The application will do the work for you!
So, here it is the first version of Gw2DragonAlert!
Link to download -> http://dfiles.eu/files/dtbhq7437

Inside the folder you will find a Readme file with some simple instuctions, please read it!
The program is very young, was made in a short time and there’s plenty of space for improvement, so feel free to give feedback and suggestions!
